name: Adafina - Wheat
instructions: Fry the onion in a pan until dark brown.
Add garlic and fry very briefly – not necessary.
Fry on low so it doesn't burn.
Add dry, clean wheat and fry briefly again.
Put in a cookie bag and put in another regular bag.
Before Shabbat, add ½ to 1 cup of water to a cup of wheat.
Then you close the bags, tie them and put them in the hot pot.
